properties.title: Golden Gate Fog Watch
properties.summary: A marine layer rolled in just before sunset, creating a striking gradient over the bay.
properties.articleHtml: The fog bank stretched across the span of the bridge, highlighting the silhouettes of the pylons. Sensors recorded a 12Â°C drop in temperature within 20 minutes.

properties.title: Seine River Glow
properties.summary: Bioluminescent algae appeared in a narrow stretch of the Seine overnight.

properties.title: Tokyo Rooftop Garden
properties.summary: Citizen scientists cataloged pollinator activity across seven rooftop habitats.
properties.articleHtml:
• Primary visitors: swallowtails, hoverflies, and honeybees.
  • Peak activity observed between 08:00-10:30.
